root: ^[Addison] I wish you could see me graduate, mom. I was excited to celebrate with you.
^[Mom] I know sweetie… but you know I’m always watching you. I’ll always be celebrating with you!
^[Addison] We were gonna go to the barbershop for a new graduated haircut…
^[Addison] ….and a celebratory dinner with the town afterwards…
^[Addison] I was excited to hug you once I got off the stage…
^[Mom] Sweetie, I’ll always be here with you.
^[Mom] Try not to think about the future, just focus on the now.
^[Mom] I’m here with you and I’m so thankful that you can see me even in ghost form.
^[Addison] Nothing matters if I can’t hug you. If I can’t feel your physical presence.
^[Mom] I know, baby. I miss giving you hugs.
^[Mom] Nothing matters since I can’t hug you and can’t feel your physical presence.
